title: (x) Jaws movie logo - custom drawn {Stephen}
content:
Any ideas? Similar to Gill Sans Ultra Bold? Custom?  
Would love some help identifying this. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110110194824im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JAWS_logo_6347.png)
author: apparatusâ„¢

comments.content: Thanks Stephen, can you recommend a typeface that is similar, that it may have been based from if it was custom?

These are often drawn from scratch. The 'J' is unique. I can find you stuff that comes close, though.

[Bureau Grot](http://web.archive.org/web/20110110194824/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/bureau_grot_black/?sample_text=JAWS&sample_size=60&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1)  
 [Grotesque No. 9](http://web.archive.org/web/20110110194824/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/grotesque_no_9_ot_std/?sample_text=JAWS&sample_size=60&acs_ss=-1&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1)  
 [Headline Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20110110194824/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/headline_bold/?sample_text=JAWS&sample_size=60&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1)  
 [Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20110110194824/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/mark_simonson/proxima_nova_condensed_black_ot/?sample_text=JAWS&sample_size=60&acs_ss=-1&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1) (more straight)  
 [MVB Grenadine](http://web.archive.org/web/20110110194824/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/mvb_fonts/mvb_grenadine_two/?sample_text=JAWS&sample_size=60) (more comical)
